CastHost Team







FAQ:



Am I locked into a Contract?



No, you are not locked into a contract and can cancel at any time.



What do I need to stream?



In order to successfully broadcast you need only a few simple things. First is a computer that has Windows, Mac, or a Linux operating system installed. Second is an internet connection. It is required you have a broadband connection to stream properly without any lag or buffering issues if you choose to encode from your computer.



If you need more assistance please do not hesitate to contact us! We are always here to help.



Do I Require a License?



You do not require a license if you are streaming original content.

If you are playing copyrighted material and your stream is public you DO need to license your stream. Or you would need to get permission from every record label to play their music. It is called getting public performance rights. Honestly its easier to just get a stream license.

Luckily we live in an internet age and getting a license for your stream is really easy and is becoming affordable. You can look up many “blanket” licensing providers that will manage the fees for you at a monthly rate.



If you need more assistance please do not hesitate to contact us! We are always here to help.
